actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4063 (a) (5) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt asphalt distributors from the excise tax on motor vehicles, parts and accessories.

summary.text: Exempts asphalt distributors, under the Internal Revenue Code, from the excise tax on motor vehicles, parts, and accessories.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4063 (a) (5) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt asphalt distributors from the excise tax on motor vehicles, parts and accessories.
